Summary: dark grey or black hovering silent
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around July 15th 1975
divs: Sighting Detailsi was hiking with freind in mts. at a retreat caled finegold,20 miles west of fresno. we herd a strange noise and climbed up a ridge to see what it was and thats when we saw the cow standing there he could not move but was yelling. over the cow was a disk hovering.and then we saw 2 figures 1 by cow was taller and another 30 ft. away who was shorter.then we noticed we could not move and jason was scared as hell but i was ok.we could talk and that was it,next thing i remember we were running down a road back to camp. we told people they thought us crazy since then ive saw them twice more,in santa barbara cal. and they were always freindly and said when the time is right all will know. im not telling alot as i cant type worth a shit but im not 1 of those people fixated by them or need to get it out for my wellbeing, i simply remember more and have a message from them which all will know when time is right. jim and suzy ran the camp which is a new detail, i just want to relive it to bring out more info.
